named-native-query.name: BilheteModel.buscaPremiadosPorSorteio
named-native-query.query: select * from NFP_ContaCorrente..TB_BIL_BILHETE where sor_codsorteio = ?1 and sop_codpremio is not null order by sop_codpremio

named-native-query.name: BilheteModel.buscaConsumidorPorSorteio
named-native-query.query: select * from NFP_ContaCorrente..TB_BIL_BILHETE where sor_codsorteio = ?1 and bil_cpfcnpj = ?2 order by bil_numbilhete

named-native-query.name: BilheteModel.buscaEntidadePorSorteio
named-native-query.query: select * from NFP_ContaCorrente..TB_BIL_BILHETE where sor_codsorteio = ?1 and bil_cnpjentidade = ?2 order by bil_numbilhete

named-native-query.name: BilheteModel.buscaPorSorteio
named-native-query.query: select * from NFP_ContaCorrente..TB_BIL_BILHETE where sor_codsorteio = ?1 order by bil_numbilhete

named-native-query.name: BilheteModel.buscaConsumidorSemPremioPorSorteio
named-native-query.query: select * from NFP_ContaCorrente..TB_BIL_BILHETE bil where sor_codsorteio = ?1 and sop_codpremio is null order by bil_numbilhete

named-native-query.name: BilheteModel.buscaEntidadeSemPremioPorSorteio
named-native-query.query: select * from NFP_ContaCorrente..TB_BIL_BILHETE bil where bil.sor_codsorteio = ?1 and bil.sop_codpremio is null and bil_cnpjentidade is not null order by bil_numbilhete

named-native-query.name: BilheteModel.buscaQuantidadePorDatas
named-native-query.query: select isnull(sum(crc_vlCredito), 0) from (select vw.crc_cpfCnpj, (cast(sum(vw.crc_vlCredito)/100 as int)) crc_vlCredito from NFP_ContaCorrente..vw_crc_credito_consumidor vw where cast(vw.crc_dtMovimentacao as date) between ?1 and ?2 group by vw.crc_cpfCnpj) vw where vw.crc_vlCredito > 0

named-native-query.name: BilheteModel.buscaQuantidadePorSorteio

named-native-query.name: BilheteModel.buscaQuantidadePremiadosPorSorteio
named-native-query.query: select count(*) from NFP_ContaCorrente..TB_BIL_BILHETE where sor_codsorteio = ?1 and sop_codpremio is not null
